# ChangeLog

## v4.1.7
* Switch from short vip to long vip

## v4.1.5
* Removed explicitly defined discovery instrument

## v4.1.4
* Added urn for service-discovery

## v4.1.3
* Fixed: Service client warn message

## v4.1.2
* Fixed: Server crashes when invalid host is sent via headers
https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-1615

## v4.0.3
* Fixed: should handle invalid host names and return error when this happens, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-1549

## v4.0.2
* Added getExchangeRate method to support money conversion in nodejs platform
* Fixed: should check for undefined when using siteoverride to avoid conflict with siteid=0, https://github.corp.ebay.com/nodejs/kernel-services-ebay/issues/14

## v4.0.1
* Fixed incorrect url building in QA while allowing to run it also in prod. Eventually the parser/formatter can become platform module. https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-1368

## v4.0.0
* Remove peer and unwanted dependencies and upgrade dependencies

* Perf: should not check isInternalHost for external traffic as it is very expensive operation.

## v0.1.19
* Upgraded `@ebay/service-client-ebay` to 1.x

## v0.1.18
* Removed unused dependencies

## v0.1.12
* Fixed: should allow site override only for internal users

## v0.1.11
* Added siteoverride option

## v0.1.10
* Fixed max age (30 mins) for caching site info

## v0.1.10
* Converted to service-client-ebay to provide configbean/mardown and up/cal/tracking/etc.

## v0.1.9
* Updated expired endpoints for QA/DEV/LNP environments.
